name: Tiny Pirate Dash - Paradise Caribbean Cove
name_original: Tiny Pirate Dash - Paradise Caribbean Cove
description:
-- Tiny Pirates with BIG Guns!!! Crazy Zombies and Scary Ghosts!

Arrrgh, Matey! There’s gold on that there ship! Are ye an Ol' Seadog or just one o them Scallywags? It's time for you to show what ye got and fetch the booty. You'll need to race across this old Pirate vessel to collect gold doubloons while shooting Zombies, Ghosts, and even King Crabs! It’s a challenge, Matey. Arrrgh…

Do you have what it takes? Gather gold doubloons to earn new Pirates!

- Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
- Great Time-Killer Game!
- Tons of fun!

Download ‘Tiny Pirate Dash’ Now!!!
